descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 25 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Grab an instrument and get ready to jam in **Virtuoso**, your own virtual music stage! This VR musical sandbox lets anyone play and perform music in new, immersive ways. Explore a range of unique instruments made for VR and share your tracks with the world!
[media]
# BE THE ARTIST OF YOUR DREAMS
Create music in real-time using the **Looper** and easily share it for all to hear! Even if you've never touched an instrument before, features like **Tempo Sync** and **preset scales** help you stay in time and on pitch.
[media]
# MADE-FOR-VR INSTRUMENTS
The seven instruments of Virtuoso have been created specifically for VR. Set up your own custom drum kit with the **Empads** and tickle the keys of the three-dimensional **Oorgan**. You can also add vocals with lush reverb using the virtual **Microphone**!
[media]
# FROM OPENING ACT TO HEADLINER
The interactive tutorial along with intuitive instruments and tools means that everyone, from professional producers to casual music lovers, can become Virtuosos!
[media]
